page.title: 17KINKELL BRAES CARAVAN PARK
page.content: Kinkell Braes Caravan Park-situated on a raised beach-enjoys an enviable position approximately 1 mile South- East of St Andrews and has a commanding view over St Andrews Bay and harbour. It covers 30 acres of land and houses well equipped caravans for rent as well as 69 places for overnight caravans, 69 for tents and 69 for motor caravans. It is only open in the summer season (March to October) and offers many facilities such as hot and cold water, showers, toilets, laundrette, washing, drying and ironing facilities, telephones, licence bar/club room, shop, television and regular entertainment, water points, playground and games room.
